# ios 14 Drawer 不能打开

`unconfirmed`

### Reproduction link

[https://ant.design/components/drawer-cn](https://ant.design/components/drawer-cn)

### Steps to reproduce

https://ant.design/components/drawer-cn 用ios14自带浏览器和微信内打不开Drawer, 个人项目中也是如此, 但安卓手机正常.

### What is expected?

ios 14能打开Drawer

### What is actually happening?

ios 14打不开Drawer

| ----------- | ---------- |
| antd        | 5.2.2      |
| React       | 18.2.0     |
| System      | ios 14.4.2 |
| Browser     | safari 14  |
